column2: Orson Scott Card's Speaker for the Dead (2010) #2
column6: Ender is called to a distant planet to speak the death of a scientist brutally murdered by a mysterious alien species. But instead of uncovering the truth, Ender finds a web of lies and deceit that threatens to endanger the entire planet!
column8: | penciller (cover):Giuseppe Camuncoli | writer:Orson Scott Card | writer:Aaron Johnston | penciller:Pop Mahn | editor:Jordan White
